scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,WEB,DESK -c green,magenta,yellow "pnpm -C apps/server dev" "pnpm -C apps/client dev" "pnpm -C apps/desktop dev"

scripts.start: pnpm -C apps/server start & pnpm -C apps/desktop start
